PersistingRepresentable

class naive.PersistingRepresentable(source=None, source_representable=None, source_string=None, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: ABCRepresentable

A helper class for objects that support representation in multiple formats by storing representations in object properties.

__abstractmethods__ = frozenset({})
__annotations__ = {}
__init__(source=None, source_representable=None, source_string=None, **kwargs)[source]

Initializes the object and stores its representations in available formats.

Kwargs:

source_representable (ABCRepresentable): A source source_representable object whose representation should be imitated. source_string (source_string): A source object that may be converted to source_string to get a UTF-8 representation. …: Representation formats may be passed in kwargs (e.g. ascii=’phi’, latex=r’phi’).

__module__ = '_class_persisting_representable'
imitate(o: ABCRepresentable)[source]

Imitate the representation of another object.

represent(rformat: Optional[str] = None, *args, **kwargs) → str[source]

Get the object’s representation in a supported format.

Parameters

  • rformat (str) – A representation format.

  • args – For future use.

  • kwargs – For future use.

Returns

The object’s representation in the requested format.
